# Payroll Processing

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/payroll-processing/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PAYROLL PROCESSING
Payroll Processing

Process payroll directly in Mangomint with our fully integrated Payroll Processing.

Pay employees and contractors via direct deposit and provide paystubs.

Assign benefits and time off (PTO) policies to workers.

Run payroll for all your locations.

Payroll Processing also includes:

Unlimited payroll runs at no extra charge (regular and off-cycle runs).

Automated notifications, including payroll reminders and confirmations.

W2s and 1099s for your workers at the end of the year.

With Payroll Processing, we will also calculate, pay, and file local, state, and federal taxes.

To learn more about Payroll Processing and the Payroll report, the following on-demand videos are available:

Video: Payroll Processing & Reporting

Video: Payroll Reporting

The articles in this section cover Payroll Processing, including how to sign up for Payroll Processing, run payroll in Mangomint, and more.

Note: 

Payroll Processing is available with our Payroll Processing add-on. Billing users can go to the Subscription page to manage subscription add-ons.

In this section:
Employer Onboarding for Payroll
Worker Onboarding for Payroll
Running Payroll
FAQ: Payroll Processing
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
